text:
Trying to build a war file using the war task on produces a war file with the 
web.xml file placed in a web-inf catalog using non-capitals.

When deploying the file on tomcat it sometimes can't find the WEB-INF/web.xml 
file. I've been using WinZip to check out the created war file.

However the lib directory is created under WEB-INF/lib

I've tried ant 1.5 alpha as well with the same result. Using java 1.4 on 
windows 2000.
creator: fredrik.duprez@home.se
jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
This is a WinZip issue, not a <war> issue.  The WAR file is created correctly.  
If you're having problems with the actual unexpanded WAR file, then please 
attach an example build file and code that duplicates the problem and re-open 
this issue.
